title: Help
body: Guys, I want an account in PBE but I don't want to play in NA server . I just want to try it . Could I get some help here ?

replies.body:
thanks. btw , please help me to at least get to honor 3
i really want to play in the PBE server
I believe anyone should be able to signup for PBE accounts, not just NA players.
PBE is only on NA region
